TEST_NAME: Reports should have a reset button
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when pir.show_search_bar = 'No'
                         then 'Y'
                         when apr.buttons = 0 
                         then 'N' 
                         else case when apb.display_position = 'RIGHT_OF_IR_SEARCH_BAR'
                                then 'Y'
                                else 'N'
                                end
                         end pass_yn,
                apr.application_id,
                apr.page_id,
                null created_by,
                null created_on,
                apr.last_updated_by,
                apr.last_updated_on,
                apr.region_name, 
                apr.buttons, 
                apb.button_name, 
                apb.label, 
                apb.display_position,
                apr.region_id component_id,
                apb.button_sequence,
                pir.show_search_bar
            from apex_application_page_regions apr
            inner join apex_application_page_ir pir on apr.application_id = pir.application_id
                                                    and apr.page_id = pir.page_id
                                                    and apr.region_id = pir.region_id 
            left outer join apex_application_page_buttons apb on apr.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                              and apr.page_id = apb.page_id
                                                              and apr.region_id = apb.region_id
                                                              and apb.label = 'Reset')
select std.pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N' 
            then apex_string.format('Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing a Reset button in the correct location %3',
                                    p0 => std.region_name,
                                    p1 => std.page_id,
                                    p2 => std.application_id,
                                    p3 => case when std.display_position is not null
                                               then '( It is in the : `'||std.display_position||'` position but should be `Right of Interactive Report Search Bar` position in the left-most position)'
                                               end)
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.pass_yn = 'N' 
            then apex_string.format('Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing a Reset button',
                                    p0 => std.region_name,
                                    p1 => std.page_id,
                                    p2 => std.application_id)
            end issue_title,
       show_search_bar,
			 std.component_id,
			 null parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION: Always display a reset button in the "Right of Interactive Report Toolbar" position. This reset button should be the left-most button in this position (any other buttons in this position should be to the left of the reset button).
FIX: Create a reset button or correct the existing one by moving it's display position

TEST_NAME: Classic Report should be correctly styled
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when apr.template != 'Standard'
                         then 'C_WRONG_TEMPLATE'
                         else case when apr.parent_region_id is null 
                                   then case when apr.region_template_options not like '%noPadding%'
                                             then 'C_REMOVE_PADDING'
                                             when apr.region_template_options not like '%noBorder%'
                                             then 'C_NO_BORDER'
                                             end
                                   when apr.region_template_options not like '%noUI%'
                                   then 'C_REMOVE_UI_DEC'
                                   end
                         end child_code,
                    apr.region_name, 
                    apr.template, 
                    apr.region_template_options, 
                    apr.component_template_options, 
                    apr.parent_region_id parent_component_id,
                    apr.application_id,
                    apr.page_id,
                    apr.last_updated_by,
                    apr.last_updated_on,
                    apr.region_id component_id
            from apex_application_page_regions apr
						inner join apex_applications aa on apr.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and aa.theme_number = 42
            where apr.source_type  = 'Report')
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('Classic Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is incorrectly styled. %3',
                                    p0 => std.region_name,
                                    p1 => std.page_id,
                                    p2 => std.application_id,
                                    p3 => 
                                    case when std.child_code  = 'C_WRONG_TEMPLATE'
                                         then 'The template should be `Standard` '||' but is currently `'||std.template||'`'
                                         when std.child_code  = 'C_REMOVE_PADDING'
                                         then 'The padding should be removed'
                                         when std.child_code  = 'C_NO_BORDER'
                                         then 'The border should be removed'
                                         when std.child_code  = 'C_REMOVE_UI_DEC'
                                         then 'The style should be `Remove UI Decoration` because it is a sub region'
                                         end
                                    ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('Classic Report `%0` (page %1, app %2) is incorrectly styled',
                                    p0 => std.region_name,
                                    p1 => std.page_id,
                                    p2 => std.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.component_id,
       std.template, 
       std.region_template_options, 
       std.component_template_options, 
       std.parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION:
[Region level template options to No Region Padding, the Report template options to "No Outer Borders". Ensure a sub region's style is "Remove UI Decoration".]
*   C\_NO\_BORDER : Classic reports should be styled to have no borders
*   C\_REMOVE\_PADDING : Classic reports should be styled to have no padding
*   C\_REMOVE\_UI\_DEC : Classic reports that are sub-regions should be styled not have any UI Decoration
*   C\_WRONG\_TEMPLATE : Classic Reports should have a 'Standard' template
FIX:
*   C\_NO\_BORDER : Remove the borders
*   C\_REMOVE\_PADDING : Correct style
*   C\_REMOVE\_UI\_DEC : Remove UI Decoration
*   C\_WRONG\_TEMPLATE : Correct the template

TEST_NAME: Pages should limit the amount of Dynamic Actions
QUERY_CLOB:
with tmd as (select application_id, page_id, count(*) da_count
             from apex_application_page_da
             having count(*) > 20
             group by application_id, page_id)
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       tmd.application_id,
       tmd.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has %2 dynamic actions. It is not recommended to have more than 10.',
                          tmd.application_id,
                          tmd.page_id,
                          tmd.da_count) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has too many Dynamic Actions',
                          tmd.application_id,
                          tmd.page_id) issue_title,
       tmd.da_count,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 tmd.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from tmd
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  tmd.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and tmd.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Pages should limit the number of Dynamic Actions per page to 10. Never more than 20. : Try to limit the number of Dynamic Actions per page to 10. Never more than 20.
FIX: Cut down on the number of Dynamic Actions

TEST_NAME: Form Elements should have help text
QUERY_CLOB:
with api as (select case when api.item_source_type = 'Region Source Column'
                         then case when api.item_help_text is null 
                                   then 'N'
                                   else 'Y'
                                   end 
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    api.application_id,
                    api.page_id,
                    api.last_updated_by,
                    api.last_updated_on,
                    api.item_id component_id,
                    api.item_name,
                    api.item_source_type,
                    api.item_help_text,
                    api.display_as,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
						 				abo.status_on_export
            from apex_application_page_items api
						inner join apex_application_pages aap on  api.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                  and api.page_id = aap.page_id
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on  abo.application_id = api.application_id
                                                               and aap.build_option = abo.build_option_name 
            where api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
						and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            )
select api.pass_yn,
       api.application_id,
       api.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       api.last_updated_by,
       api.last_updated_on,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2, displayed as `%3`) is missing Help Text. Form items require Help Text.',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id,
                          p3 => api.display_as) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing Help Text',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
       api.component_id,
       api.item_name,
       api.display_as,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 api.item_help_text,
			 api.item_source_type
from api
EXPLANATION: All editable form elements should have help text

QUERY_CLOB:
with tmr as (select application_id, page_id, count(*) region_count
            from apex_application_page_regions
            having count(*) >= 50
            group by application_id, page_id)
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       tmr.application_id,
       tmr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has %2 regions. It is not recommended to have more than 20. Consider dividing the content between several pages.',
                          p0 => tmr.application_id,
                          p1 => tmr.page_id,
                          p2 => tmr.region_count) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has too many regions',
                          tmr.application_id,
                          tmr.page_id) issue_title,
       tmr.region_count,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
       tmr.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from tmr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  tmr.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and tmr.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: A page should not have more than 20 regions : Most reasonably complex pages should have no more than 20 regions per page. Only in extremely rare conditions should a page have more than 50 regions. Pages with more than 50 regions should be refactored into multiple pages.
FIX: Consider dividing the content between several pages

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when regexp_instr (translate(rpc.heading,'()-',' '), '[[:punct:]]') > 0
                then 'NOPUNCTUATION_C'
								when rpc.heading like '%YN'
                then 'YESNO_C'
                when rpc.heading <> replace(rpc.heading,'Id', 'ID')
                then 'CAPID_C'
                end child_code,
       rpc.application_id, 
       rpc.page_id, 
       rpc.column_alias, 
       rpc.heading report_label, 
       rpc.region_name,
       rpc.region_id,
       rpc.region_report_column_id component_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       rpc.last_updated_by,
       rpc.last_updated_on,
       rpc.column_is_hidden
    from apex_application_page_rpt_cols rpc
	  inner join apex_application_page_regions aar on rpc.application_id = aar.application_id
                                                 and rpc.page_id = aar.page_id
                                                 and rpc.region_id = aar.region_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aar.build_option
    where rpc.column_is_hidden = 'No'
	  and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y' 
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (region %1, page %2, app %3) %4',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => case when std.child_code = 'NOPUNCTUATION_C'
                                     then 'should not include punctuation'
																		 when std.child_code ='YESNO_C'
																		 then 'should not include `YN`'
																		 when std.child_code ='CAPID_C'
																		 then 'has incorrect capitalization for `ID`'
                                     end
                          ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (region %1, page %2, app %3) is incorrectly formatted',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id
                          ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION:
Classic Report Column headers should be meaningful, formatted and punctuation free : *   CAPID\_C : Ensure the letters I and D are both capitalized in Column Headers like "Service ID, Resource ID, Region ID, etc..." These are incorrect: Service Id, service id, etc...
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_C : Column Headers should not include punctuation
*   YESNO\_C : Never include YN as part of the column header's title
FIX:
*   CAPID\_C : Correct the capitalization
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_C : Remove the punctuation
*   YESNO\_C : Rename column heading

TEST_NAME: Reflow / Toggle Column header is appropriate
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when regexp_instr (translate(prc.heading,'()-',' '), '[[:punct:]]') > 0
                then 'NOPUNCTUATION_RF'
								when prc.heading like '%YN'
                then 'YESNO_RF'
                when prc.heading <> replace(prc.heading,'Id', 'ID')
                then 'CAPID_RF'
                end child_code,
       prc.application_id, 
       prc.page_id, 
       prc.name column_alias, 
       prc.heading report_label, 
       prc.region_name,
       prc.region_id,
       prc.region_column_id component_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       prc.last_updated_by,
       prc.last_updated_on,
       prc.is_visible
    from apex_application_page_reg_cols prc
    where prc.is_visible = 'Yes'
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y' 
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (region %1, page %2, app %3) %4',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => case when std.child_code = 'NOPUNCTUATION_RF'
                                     then 'should not include punctuation'
																		 when std.child_code ='YESNO_RF'
																		 then 'should not include `YN`'
																		 when std.child_code ='CAPID_RF'
																		 then 'has incorrect capitalization for `ID`'
                                     end
                          ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (region %1, page %2, app %3) is incorrectly formatted',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id
                          ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION:
Reflow and Column Toggle headers should be meaningful, formatted and punctuation free : *   CAPID\_RF : Ensure the letters I and D are both capitalized in Column Headers like "Service ID, Resource ID, Region ID, etc..." These are incorrect: Service Id, service id, etc...
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_RF : Column Headers should not include punctuation
*   YESNO\_RF : Never include YN as part of the column header's title
FIX:
*   CAPID\_RF : Correct the capitalization
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_RF : Remove the punctuation
*   YESNO\_RF : Rename column heading

TEST_NAME: Themes should be specific numbers and subscribed
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select aats.theme_number, 
                    aats.subscribed_from, 
                    aats.is_subscribed,
                    case when aats.theme_number not in (42,1000)
                            then 'WRONGTHEME'
                            when aats.subscribed_from is null 
                            then 'NOSUBSCRIPTION'
                            when aats.theme_number = 1000
                            then case when aats.subscribed_from != '10000. Redwood'
                                      then 'WRONGSUBSCRIPTION'
                                      end
                            else null
                            end child_code, 
                    aats.application_id, 
                    null page_id,
                    aats.created_by,
                    aats.created_on,
                    aats.last_updated_by last_updated_by,
                    aats.last_updated_on last_updated_on,
                    aats.theme_style_id component_id, 
                    null parent_component_id
            from apex_application_theme_styles aats
						where aats.is_current = 'Yes')
select case when std.child_code is not null 
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id, 
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('The theme of App %0 %1',
                          p0 => std.application_id,
                          p1 => case when std.child_code = 'WRONGTHEME'
                                     then 'is not an approved theme number. The theme number is '||std.theme_number||' but should be 42 or 1000'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NOSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to a mSVTer theme. All themes should be subscribed to a mSVTer theme'
                                     when std.child_code = 'WRONGSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to the wrong mSVTer theme (`'||std.subscribed_from||'`). It should be subscribed to `10000. Redwood`'
                                     end
                ) 
            end validation_failure_message, 
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('The theme of App %0 %1',
                          p0 => std.application_id,
                          p1 => case when std.child_code = 'WRONGTHEME'
                                     then 'is not an approved theme number'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NOSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to a mSVTer theme'
                                     when std.child_code = 'WRONGSUBSCRIPTION'
                                     then 'is not subscribed to the wrong mSVTer theme'
                                     end
                ) 
            end issue_title,
       std.child_code, 
       std.component_id, 
       std.parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION:
Themes should be subscribed and be 42 or 1000 : *   NOSUBSCRIPTION : All app themes should be subscribed to a mSVTer
*   THEME\_SUBSCRIPTION : Apps with Redwood should be subscribed to app 1000
*   WRONGTHEME : The only approved theme numbers are 42 and 1000

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select apb.application_id, 
                    apb.page_id, 
                    apb.button_id component_id, 
                    apb.button_name, 
                    bto.column_value template_option,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
                    apb.last_updated_by,
                    apb.last_updated_on,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
						 				abo.status_on_export
            from apex_application_page_buttons apb
            inner join table(apex_string.split(apb.button_template_options, ':')) bto 
                        on bto.column_value in ('rw-Button--sm', 'rw-Button--md', 'rw-Button--lg', 't-Button--tiny', 't-Button--small', 't-Button--large')
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                  and aap.page_id = apb.page_id
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on  abo.application_id = apb.application_id
                                                               and aap.build_option = abo.build_option_name
            where coalesce(abo.status_on_export, 'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            )
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have a default size but currently has a size of `%3`', 
                          p0 => std.button_name,
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.template_option) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have a default size', 
                          p0 => std.button_name,
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id) issue_title,
       std.component_id,
       std.button_name,
       std.template_option,
			 null parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION: Button size should be default - always.
FIX: Restore the button size to default

QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aap.page_template in ('AO Generic')
            then 'Y'
            when aap.page_id = eba_stds_parser.page_from_url(
                                            p_origin_app_id => aa.application_id,
                                            p_url => aa.home_link)
            then 'Y'
            else case when coalesce(apr.bc_count,0) = 0 
                      then 'N'
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            end pass_yn,
      aap.application_id, 
      aap.page_id, 
      aap.created_by,
      aap.created_on,
      aap.last_updated_by,
      aap.last_updated_on,
      case when coalesce(apr.bc_count,0) = 0 
           then apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is missing a breadcrumb',
                                    p0 => aap.page_id,
                                    p1 => aap.application_id)
           end validation_failure_message,
      case when coalesce(apr.bc_count,0) = 0 
           then apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is missing a breadcrumb. All non-modal pages should have a breadcrumb region displayed',
                                    p0 => aap.page_id,
                                    p1 => aap.application_id)
           end issue_title,
      apr.bc_count,
      aap.page_mode,
      aap.build_option,
      abo.build_option_status,
      abo.status_on_export,
      aap.page_template,
			aap.page_id component_id,
			null parent_component_id
from apex_application_pages aap 
inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
left join (select application_id, page_id, count(*) bc_count 
      from apex_application_page_regions
      where source_type = 'Breadcrumb'
      group by application_id, page_id
     ) apr on aap.application_id = apr.application_id
           and aap.page_id = apr.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.page_mode = 'Normal'
and aap.page_id not in (0,101,9999)
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
Use the breadcrumb region's button positions to add the page's primary action. All non-modal pages should have a breadcrumb region displayed. : Use the breadcrumb region's button positions to add the page's primary action.  
All non-modal pages should have a breadcrumb region displayed.

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when prc.heading_alignment != prc.column_alignment
                         then 'MISALIGN_C'
                         end child_code,
            prc.application_id, 
            prc.page_id, 
            prc.column_alias, 
            prc.heading, 
            prc.heading_alignment,
            prc.column_alignment,
            prc.display_as,
            null column_type,
            prc.region_id,
            prc.region_name,
            prc.region_report_column_id component_id,
            prc.last_updated_by,
            prc.last_updated_on,
            null created_on,
            null created_by
            from apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc
        )
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) %4', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id,
                            p4 => case when std.child_code  = 'LEFT_ALIGN_C'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the left'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'RIGHT_ALIGN_C'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the right'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'MISALIGN_C'
                                       then 'is misaligned with the heading'
                                       end
                            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) is incorrectly aligned', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id) issue_title,
       std.child_code,
       std.region_id,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on std.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and apr.report_template not in ('List Item')
where std.heading is not null
EXPLANATION:
Classic Report Columns should be aligned according to their data type : *   LEFT\_ALIGN\_C : Dates, names, identifier columns should be left aligned
*   MISALIGN\_C : The Column and Column Heading have different alignment
*   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_C : Number columns should be right aligned
FIX:
*   The Column and Heading should be aligned the same way:
    *   Left Align: All columns by default (dates, names, identifiers, etc)
    *   Center Align: Buttons / Actions / Icons / Badges
    *   Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)
    *   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_C : \* Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when api.label like '%YN'
                then 'FORMYESNO'
                when api.label <> replace(api.label,'Id', 'ID')
                then 'FORMCAPID'
                end child_code,
                    api.application_id,
                    api.page_id,
                    api.last_updated_by,
                    api.last_updated_on,
                    api.item_id component_id,
                    api.item_name,
                    api.item_source_type,
                    api.item_help_text,
                    api.display_as,
                    api.label,
                    null created_by,
                    null created_on,
										null parent_component_id
            from apex_application_page_items api
            where api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y' 
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Form field `%0` (page %2, app %3) %4',
                          p0 => std.label,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => case when std.child_code ='FORMYESNO'
							  										then 'should not include `YN`'
							  										when std.child_code ='FORMCAPID'
							  										then 'has incorrect capitalization for `ID`'
                                    end
                          ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Form field `%0` (page %2, app %3) is incorrectly formatted',
                          p0 => std.label,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id
                          ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
		 std.component_id,
		 std.parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION:
Form field labels should be meaningful, formatted and punctuation free : *   FORMCAPID : Ensure the letters I and D are both capitalized in label like "Service ID, Resource ID, Region ID, etc..." These are incorrect: Service Id, service id, etc...
*   FORMYESNO : Never include YN as part of the label
FIX:
*   FORMCAPID : Correct the capitalization
*   FORMYESNO : correct the label

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when pic.heading_alignment != pic.column_alignment
                        then 'MISALIGN_IR'
                        when pic.column_type in ('DATE', 'STRING')
                        then case when pic.heading_alignment = 'RIGHT'
                                  then 'LEFT_ALIGN_IR'
                                  end
                        when pic.column_type in ('NUMBER')
                        then case when pic.heading_alignment = 'LEFT'
                                  then 'RIGHT_ALIGN_IR'
                                  end
                        end child_code,
            pic.application_id, 
            pic.page_id, 
            pic.column_alias, 
            pic.report_label heading, 
            pic.heading_alignment,
            pic.column_alignment,
            pic.display_text_as display_as,
            pic.column_type,
            pic.region_id,
            pic.region_name,
            pic.column_id component_id,
            pic.updated_by last_updated_by,
            pic.updated_on last_updated_on,
            pic.created_on,
            pic.created_by
            from  apex_application_page_ir_col pic
        )
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) %4', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id,
                            p4 => case when std.child_code  = 'LEFT_ALIGN_IR'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the left'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'RIGHT_ALIGN_IR'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the right'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'MISALIGN_IR'
                                       then 'is misaligned with the heading'
                                       end
                            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) is incorrectly aligned', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id) issue_title,
       std.child_code,
       std.region_id,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on std.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and apr.report_template not in ('List Item')
where std.heading is not null
EXPLANATION:
Interactive Report Columns should be aligned according to their data type : *   LEFT\_ALIGN\_IR : Dates, names, identifier columns should be left aligned
*   MISALIGN\_IR : The Column and Column Heading have different alignment
*   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_IR : Number columns should be right aligned
FIX:
*   The Column and Heading should be aligned the same way:
    *   Left Align: All columns by default (dates, names, identifiers, etc)
    *   Center Align: Buttons / Actions / Icons / Badges
    *   Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)

TEST_NAME: Pages should not have local CSS
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aap.inline_css is null
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id, 
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format(
        p_message => q'^Page %0 (Application %1) has page-level inline CSS^',
        p0 => aap.page_id,
        p1 => aap.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format(
        p_message => q'^Remove page-level inline CSS (Page %0 /Application %1) ^',
        p0 => aap.page_id,
        p1 => aap.application_id) issue_title,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from apex_application_pages aap
inner join v_apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                  and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: All CSS should be centralized and kept out of local pages : Applications should consolidate CSS and not have CSS locally

TEST_NAME: Apps should have a centralized css file
QUERY_CLOB:
with aac as (select application_id, count(1) page_count
                from apex_application_pages
                where inline_css is not null
                group by application_id),
    acss as (select application_id, count(1) file_count
                from apex_application_static_files
                where file_name like '%css'
                group by application_id),
     std as (
        select aac.application_id,
               null page_id,
               aa.created_by,
               aa.created_on,
               aa.last_updated_by,
               aa.last_updated_on,
               aa.css_file_urls,
               aac.page_count,
               acss.file_count,
               case when aac.page_count = 0
                    then 'Y' 
                    else case when coalesce(acss.file_count,0) = 0
                              then 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                              else case when aa.css_file_urls is null 
                                        then 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                                        end
                              end 
                    end child_code
        from aac 
        inner join apex_applications aa on aac.application_id = aa.application_id
        left outer join acss on acss.application_id = aac.application_id
     )
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('App %0 %1',
                    p0 => std.application_id,
                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                               then 'is missing a CSS file in Static Application Files (suggestion: `css/main.css`)'
                               when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                               then 'does not reference a centralized css file in Application Definition > User Interfaces > CSS File URLs'
                               end
                ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('App %0 %1',
                    p0 => std.application_id,
                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                               then 'is missing a centralized CSS file'
                               when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                               then 'does not reference a centralized css file'
                               end
                ) 
            end  issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
     std.css_file_urls,
     std.page_count,
     std.file_count,
		 std.application_id component_id,
     null parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION: Apps with page-level inline css should have a css file in static files

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when pig.data_type in ('DATE', 'VARCHAR2')
                        then case when pig.heading_alignment = 'RIGHT'
                                  then 'LEFT_ALIGN_IG'
                                  end
                        when pig.data_type in ('NUMBER')
                        then case when pig.heading_alignment = 'LEFT'
                                  then 'RIGHT_ALIGN_IG'
                                  end
                        end child_code,
            pig.application_id, 
            pig.page_id, 
            pig.source_expression column_alias, 
            pig.heading, 
            pig.heading_alignment,
            null column_alignment,
            pig.item_type display_as,
            pig.data_type column_type,
            pig.region_id,
            pig.region_name,
            pig.column_id component_id,
            pig.last_updated_by,
            pig.last_updated_on,
            null created_on,
            null created_by
        from  apex_appl_page_ig_columns pig
        )
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) %4', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id,
                            p4 => case when std.child_code  = 'LEFT_ALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the left'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'RIGHT_ALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the right'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'MISALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'is misaligned with the heading'
                                       end
                            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) is incorrectly aligned', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id) issue_title,
       std.child_code,
       std.region_id,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on std.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and apr.report_template not in ('List Item')
where std.heading is not null
EXPLANATION:
Interactive Grid Columns should be aligned according to their data type : *   LEFT\_ALIGN\_IG : Dates, names, identifier columns should be left aligned
*   MISALIGN\_IG : The Column and Column Heading have different alignment
*   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_IG : Number columns should be right aligned
FIX:
*   The Column and Heading should be aligned the same way:
    *   Left Align: All columns by default (dates, names, identifiers, etc)
    *   Center Align: Buttons / Actions / Icons / Badges
    *   Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)
    *   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_IG : \* Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)

QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is missing padding. Padding should not be removed at the page level',
              p0 => aap.page_id,
              p1 => aap.application_id
       ) validation_failure_message,      
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is missing padding.',
              p0 => aap.page_id,
              p1 => aap.application_id
       ) issue_title,                  
       aap.page_id component_id,             
       null parent_component_id 
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where 1=1
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and (page_template_options like '%noContentPadding%' or page_template_options like '%noMainPadding%')

TEST_NAME: Button display positions should not be legacy or deprecated
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when SVT_apex_view.display_position_is_violation (
                p_display_position_code => aapb.display_position_code,
                p_template_id           => apr.template_id,
                p_application_id        => aapb.application_id) = 'Y'
						then 'N'
						else 'Y'
						end pass_yn, 
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is in an invalid (legacy or deprecated) display position (`%3`)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id,
              p3 => aapb.display_position_code
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` in legacy / deprecated position (page %1, app %2)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id
            ) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id, 
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.display_position,
       aapb.display_position_code,
       apr.template_id,
       aapb.button_name
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on aapb.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and aapb.application_id = apr.application_id
                                             and aapb.page_id = apr.page_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
where 1=1
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: Buttons should not be placed in display positions are deprecated or legacy

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when regexp_instr (translate(pic.report_label,'()-',' '), '[[:punct:]]') > 0
                then 'NOPUNCTUATION_IR'
								when pic.report_label like '%YN'
                then 'YESNO_IR'
                when pic.report_label <> replace(pic.report_label,'Id', 'ID')
                then 'CAPID_IR'
                end child_code,
           pic.application_id, 
           pic.page_id, 
           pic.column_alias, 
           pic.report_label, 
           pic.region_name,
           pic.region_id,
           pic.column_id component_id,
           pic.created_by,
           pic.created_on,
           pic.updated_by last_updated_by,
           pic.updated_on last_updated_on,
           pic.display_text_as
    from apex_application_page_ir_col pic
    where pic.display_text_as not in ('HIDDEN')
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y' 
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (region %1, page %2, app %3) %4',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => case when std.child_code = 'NOPUNCTUATION_IR'
                                     then 'should not include punctuation'
																		 when std.child_code ='YESNO_IR'
																		 then 'should not include `YN`'
																		 when std.child_code ='CAPID_IR'
																		 then 'has incorrect capitalization for `ID`'
                                     end
                          ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (region %1, page %2, app %3) is incorrectly formatted',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id
                          ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id
from std
EXPLANATION:
Interactive Report Column headers should be meaningful, formatted and punctuation free : *   CAPID\_IR : Ensure the letters I and D are both capitalized in Column Headers like "Service ID, Resource ID, Region ID, etc..." These are incorrect: Service Id, service id, etc...
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_IR : Column Headers should not include punctuation
*   YESNO\_IR : Never include YN as part of the column header's title
FIX:
*   CAPID\_IR : Correct the capitalization
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_IR : Remove the punctuation
*   YESNO\_IR : Rename column heading

TEST_NAME: Modal Dialogs should use Floating Labels
QUERY_CLOB:
select 'N' pass_yn,
       api.application_id, 
       api.page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       api.last_updated_by,
       api.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) has a template of `%3` but should have a Floating Label. Use Floating Label templates for Modal Dialogs',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id,
                          p3 => api.item_label_template
                         ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) should have Floating Label template',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id
                         ) issue_title,
       api.item_name, 
       api.display_as,
       api.item_label_template, 
       api.item_label_template_id, 
       api.item_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id
from apex_application_page_items api 
inner join apex_applications aa on api.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.theme_number = 42
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  api.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                      and api.page_id = aap.page_id
                                      and aap.page_mode = 'Modal Dialog'
where api.item_label_template not like '%Floating'
and api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
and api.item_label_template not in ('Hidden')
EXPLANATION: Use Floating Label templates for Modal Dialogs

QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when aapb.button_name = 'DELETE'
                         then case when aapb.button_template_options not like '%danger%'
                                   then 'DANGER-DELETE'
                                   end
                         when aapb.button_name = 'CREATE'
                         then case when aapb.display_position_code = 'NEXT' and aa.theme_number = 1000
                                   then 'NEXT-CREATE'
                                   end
                         when aapb.icon_css_classes like 'fa-%'
                         then case when aa.theme_number = 1000
                                   then 'WRONGLIBRARY'
                                   when aapb.icon_css_classes like '%anim%'
                                   then 'BUTTON-ANIM'
                                   end
                         end child_code,
                    aapb.workspace, 
                    aapb.application_id, 
                    aapb.page_id, 
                    aapb.button_name, 
                    aapb.button_template_options,
                    aapb.button_id component_id,
                    aapb.last_updated_by, 
                    aapb.last_updated_on,
                    aa.theme_number,
                    aapb.display_position_code,
                    aapb.icon_css_classes
            from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
            inner join apex_applications aa on aapb.application_id = aa.application_id)
select case when std.child_code is not null 
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 'The `%0` button (app %1, page %2) %3.', 
                          p0 => std.button_name, 
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => case std.child_code 
                                     when 'DANGER-DELETE'
                                     then 'should be styled as "Danger". It currently has the following styling :`'||std.button_template_options||'`'
                                     when 'NEXT-CREATE'
                                     then 'should be placed in the `NEXT` position. It is currently in the following position: `'||std.display_position_code||'`'
                                     when 'BUTTON-ANIM'
                                     then 'has an animation. Please eliminate'
                                     when 'WRONGLIBRARY'
                                     then 'is using an invalid `Universal Theme` icon (`'||std.icon_css_classes||'`). You must use a `Redwood` icon'
                                     end) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 'The `%0` button (app %1, page %2) is incorrectly styled', 
                          p0 => std.button_name, 
                          p1 => std.application_id,
                          p2 => std.page_id)  
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
		 std.button_name, 
     std.button_template_options,
     std.component_id,
     std.display_position_code,
     null parent_component_id,
     std.theme_number,
     std.icon_css_classes
from std
EXPLANATION:
Buttons should be styled and placed correctly according to their function : *   BUTTON-ANIM : Including icons is fine (even encouraged). Icon placement should always be on the left. Adding animated icons (assigning a fa-anim-... class to an icon) is strongly discouraged. It's not the early 90's and this is not a geocities website.
*   DANGER-DELETE : Delete buttons should always styled as "Danger", and far away from the primary action.
*   NEXT-CREATE : Cancel button should be left-most button in the NEXT button position.
*   WRONGLIBRARY : You cannot use \`Universal Theme\` icons (the fa- icons) in \`Redwood\`.
FIX:
*   BUTTON-ANIM : Remove the animation
*   DANGER-DELETE : Add the Danger style to the button
*   NEXT-CREATE : Reposition the button
*   WRONGLIBRARY : Use a Redwood icon
